image.title: NEET Passport Photo Resizer - 2.5x3.5 inch / 200KB JPG
image.description: Resize your passport-size photo to the exact NEET 2025 specifications: 2.5 x 3.5 inches, JPG format, and under 200KB file size. Quick, accurate, and secure.
featureList: 📸 Upload NEET passport photo from any device
📐 Resize to 2.5 x 3.5 inches at 300 DPI
⚖️ Compress image under 200KB as per NTA rules
🛡️ Secure, mobile-friendly, and no login needed

image.title: NEET Postcard Photo Resizer - 4x6 inch / 200KB JPG
image.description: Resize your NEET postcard-size photo to 4 x 6 inches, 300 DPI, and under 200KB JPEG. Compliant with NEET 2025 upload and admit card specifications.
featureList: 📸 Upload your 4 x 6 inch NEET postcard photo
📐 Resize to exact 4 x 6 inch size at 300 DPI
